attributes.comment:
Concerning the proposal USCIS-2006-0044-

Adoption expenses are extremely expensive already and to further burden the
noble families who are willing to sacrifice of themselves, and open their hearts
and homes to a child in need of a family is simply outrageous. There are many
loving families, capable of raising happy, well adjusted children, who will
never be accessible to the children who need them most, simply because of the
incredible financial burden that must be surmounted to complete an adoption.
How many more families will they lose access to if the burden becomes even greater?

I respectfully request that this proposal be shelved.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By John LaPointe
